name: The Last Survivors (SuperArcadeEntertainment)
description:
This is the pc version of "The Last Survivors". 

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.SuperArcadeEntertainment.TheLa...

The Last Survivors was made by two young developers. The first ideas for this game were created in March. Now there is finally a pc version for the game.

Controls:

W - Run Up
A- Run Left
S - Run Down
D - Run Right

Left Mouse Button - Attack
